name: create-object-request
description: Request parameters for the CreateObject service, used to create a new BACnet object on a device.

fields.name: object-specifier

options.name: object-type
options.description: Specifies the type of object to create, letting the device assign the instance number.

options.name: object-identifier
options.description: Specifies the complete object identifier including both type and instance number.

fields.description: Specifies the object to be created, either by type alone or by complete identifier.

fields.name: list-of-initial-values
fields.description: An optional list of initial property values to be set when the object is created.
